mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(w.measuredAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS measuredAt, w.weightKg AS weightKg, pf.foodType AS foodType, pf.brand AS brand, pf.productName AS productName, pf.flavor AS flavor, pf.lifeStage AS lifeStage FROM pet_weight_log w LEFT JOIN pet_food pf ON pf.petId = w.petId AND DATE(w.measuredAt) >= pf.startedAt AND (pf.endedAt IS NULL OR DATE(w.measuredAt) <= pf.endedAt) AND pf.isPrimary = 1 WHERE w.petId = #{petId} ORDER BY w.measuredAt ASC
